Yuyuko's fan.NAME: Yuyuko's fan
DESCRIPTIONS: Block is not removed at the start of your turn. NL At the start of each combat, gain #b
#ySakura and #yButterfly into your draw pile. NL Gains 1 charge whenever you #yRest. NL At the end of each combat, you lose HP equal to the turn count, to a minimum of 1.

Coronal.NAME: Coronal
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click during combat to activate. Gain #b1 #yIntangible and #b1 #yArtifact . Recharges after #b5 combats.

Ghost Lamp.NAME: Ghost Lamp
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain 1 #yPhantom.

Trap Lamp.NAME: Trap Lamp
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b3 turns, shuffle 1 random #yDerivate #yButterfly into your draw pile.

Blue Kimono.NAME: Blue Kimono
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, select a Texture from #ySakura, #yButterfly, #yPhantom, and #yFullMoon.

Blue Kimono (Sakura).NAME: Blue Kimono (Sakura)
DESCRIPTIONS: When drawing #ySakura without extra effect,transform it to a #ySakura with random effect. NL #ySakra will deal #b3% HP loss of MaxHP to all enemies.

Blue Kimono (Butterfly).NAME: Blue Kimono (Butterfly)
DESCRIPTIONS: When drawing #yButterfly without extra effect,transform it to a #yButterfly with random effect. NL #yButterfly will heal #b3% HP for you.

Blue Kimono (Phantom).NAME: Blue Kimono (Phantom)
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b3 turns, trigger #yPhantom extra. NL At the start of each turn, place 1 #ySoul into your hand.

Blue Kimono (FullMoon).NAME: Blue Kimono (FullMoon)
DESCRIPTIONS: Each #yDiaphaneity will enhance #b1% effect. NL At the end of turn, gain 1 #yBLock for every #b5 #yDiaphaneity on you. For every #b5 #yDiaphaneity on each enemy, deal 1 HP loss to that enemy.

Obi.NAME: Obi
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP from Yuyuko's Fan, gain that much #yDiaphaneity at the start of your next combat.

Trip to Hell.NAME: Trip to Hell
DESCRIPTIONS: Doubles your #yFan at the start of combat.
